price: Dájúdájú àmì wà nínú ìyẹn. Síbẹ̀síbẹ̀ ọ̀pọ̀lọ́pọ̀ wọn kò jẹ́ onígbàgbọ́ òdodo.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُهُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laāyatan wamā kāna aktharuhum mu'minīna
